metaTitle: VPN with Russian IP address - Amnezia
metaContent: VPN with a high level of privacy and a Russian IP address. To access sites that are not available in Russia only.

header.subtext: VPN with a high level of privacy and a Russian IP address. To access sites that are available in Russia only.

plan1.header: For documents, payment of fines, housing and utilities, taxes
plan1.desc: Works only for sites that cannot be accessed from non-Russian IP addresses

plan2.header: For comfortable work, downloading large files and watching videos

paymentMethods: For ordering and payment use your Telegram account

downloadCard.header: Use the received key in the Amnezia VPN application
downloadCard.text: Amnezia VPN is a simple and free open source application to run a VPN with high privacy requirements

servicesSection.header: Government services, bank and telecom operator websites are available free of charge
servicesSection.text: When using the free tariff, all other sites will open as if the VPN is turned off. The validity of the free key is 1 month. After expiration, just get a new one also for free

step1.header: Go to Telegram to get the key
step1.text: The Telegram bot will give you a free key or accept payment and give you an unlimited VPN key

step2.text: These VPN applications are quite reliable and trustworthy

step3.header: Connect the dongle in the VPN application
step3.text: Start the VPN and import the key you received into it. Done. More detailed instructions
